elements.name: include
elements.description: Include an external partial and inject variables/slots (vite-plugin-html-include).

attributes.name: file
attributes.description: Path to the partial to include.

attributes.name: class
attributes.description: Merged with root element class of the included partial.

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: Merged with root element style of the included partial.

elements.name: slot
elements.description: Placeholder inside a partial. Can be named via the `name` attribute or left unnamed for default content.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the slot (matches <template slot="…"> inside <include>).

elements.name: template
elements.description: Used inside <include> to provide content for named slots.

attributes.name: slot
attributes.description: Target slot name defined in the included partial.
